Posts.Content: Apr 23, 2010 06:16PM mercurialqueen wrote: Hi Beesie:  I hope the odds are on my side. Thank you for answering my post. Maria
Posts.Title: Probab. of gr 3 dcis to be invasive? mercurialqueen mercurialqueen

Posts.Content: Apr 11, 2010 07:23PM mercurialqueen wrote: Hi Symphony:  I am new here too.  I have the needle biopsy on 4/20.  I completly understand how you feel.  Like everybody says it's a rollercoster.  Some times I am optimistic, sometimes I think of the worst.  Thank God I am taking my Ativan, it helps me relax, talk to your doctor about some temporary antianxiolitics, it can help you go to work and do the things we need to do, because life goes on.  I will pray for you too for the biopsy to come back B9.  I'll be thinking of you on the 16th.  I keep thinking that if it is the big C, at least it will be in the very early stages and it will be almost certainly curable.
Posts.Title: Cried all the way home!!! symphonyinD jdootoo
